title: Kha'Zix Bug. No pun intended.

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: As you can see, both the Q and E are evolved. The Q is black and showing both versions of the Q, and the wings are not there at all. They appeared  while ulting, but where invisible or entirely not there otherwise.

replies.body: Hi hi, thanks for the report!  Do you recall the order in which you evolved your skills?
Seems to me you might need to do a client repair.
